website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive model that provides good durability to keep dogs safe in the car.
pros: Uses strong materials in the carabiner to ensure long-lasting performance
Adjustable size so it works for many sizes of dogs and in many vehicle setups
Compatible with several different dog harness models
cons: Some dogs may be able to chew through the strap

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these to use with my dog's regular, step-in soft harness and it's been GREAT. He has a bolster cushion dog seat he rides on and then I use the seatbelt. There have been a few times when I've had to break suddenly and even at speeds under 50 mph, my purse, groceries, etc. go flying but not my precious buddy. I just ordered a 2nd tether strap, to introduce a friend and his new dog to good safety gizmos. One of the best things is that I got 24 hr delivery, so we can pick up the dog from rescue and already have the necessary gizmos in place.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: This thing saved my puppy's life in a car accident, great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This straps to the back of a chest harness (see pic) and then to the seat belt. It keeps him from slamming into the dash when the seat belt locks up. Anyway, I got into a car accident where my air bag when off and he was unharmed (albeit a bit shocked). Good purchase if you take your small dog in the car with you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Aubuchon

customer_reviews.title: Works great, makes car rides much easier.
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for my dog in the car. I loop it around the headrest and then through her harness strap. The length allows her to stick her head out the window a bit or lay down without worrying about her ending up on my lap or out the window. :) My dog is a medium sized terrier mix around 35 pounds. Also, I find this strap works much better than inserting the seatbelt through the harness, as she always managed to get all tangled up that way. Because this strap is attached above her head and to her back, she is able to turn around and change positions easily.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy But too short for using as seatbelt strap for my little dogs
customer_reviews.text: Works good but a little to short, would love it if could extend another 2-3 inches. But super thick and durable. Also other negative for small dogs, clip is huge and barely fits in my dogs harnesses clips. Would give it a 5 if longer length extension. However, my dog won’t be able to chew this durable strap.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M

customer_reviews.title: This is the missing link...
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to rig up a restraint system for my pit bull to allow him some freedom in the back seat of my SUV. I have a zip line strap from another product secured around the headrests on the back seat (headrests are not removable). Hooked on to that and the other end attached to his car restraint , this tether is exactly the right length to allow him to go from one side to the other, or let him lay down if he wants, but doesn't allow him to move to the front seats. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Silver Streak

customer_reviews.title: Extended use is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an extender for my dogs seat/harness car bed. It’s very strong. When you buy car harnesses for your dog look at he threading and everything to make sure it’s well made. My last one the threads were coming out and in an accident it would have allowed my dog to fly forward, not good. This one is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Study but the hardware is large!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return this but if you have a bigger dog it would be great. Hardware on it is way too large to put on a toy poodle. They should not make this product one size fits all.
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Best one according to research
customer_reviews.text: I did some research and this was the only dog seatbelt that actually worked during tests because it works with the car's seatbelt being engaged. I'd say it's worth the 7 bucks. Only problem I have is that it's a little short but my dog (55 lb chocolate lab) always lies down during car rides so it's fine for us. The length will be ideal if you have a dog who tends to move around too much in the car but for dogs who can handle a little more freedom it might be a little limiting. Still worth it for the price and safety.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality weight bearing webbing and carabiner
customer_reviews.text: definitely the strength and fit I was looking for to keep the pooch safe in the back seat. Good quality weight bearing webbing and carabiner. Loop allows for flexibility in set up-- I can loop in into a seatbelt or loop it through a handing zipline from the cargo handles in the back seat and allow pooch to go back and forth from window to window while staying safe and harnessed.
customer_reviews.author: Janine M.

customer_reviews.title: Could slip the attachment up the seat belt and it allowed him to sit much more comfortably, and even move around a bit
customer_reviews.text: Made all the difference in using a safety harness for our older 80 pound dog. Could slip the attachment up the seat belt and it allowed him to sit much more comfortably, and even move around a bit. Well worth it. Nothing fancy, but the clip is solid and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Zipalong

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product however the large quick release ring did not fit with the car seat I bought for my dog . I just unclipped it and stored under her seat in case it comes in handy later .
customer_reviews.author: Diane Young

customer_reviews.title: It broke...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give it a better score, but the carabiner broke on the second day of use. Luckily, I had an extra with me so it wasn't a huge crisis. I was quite happy with the product until then.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Safety 1st
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I board dogs and occasionally have to transport, I have harnesses specifically for car transport but this also fits and works with most harnesses, gives them room to move around but not too much, can be shortened or lengthened, telling all my clients to seatbelt their dogs in, too dangerous not to
customer_reviews.author: petsitter/ cat toy inventor

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Only have it 4 stars as it’s not quite long enough. Was hoping it would be as long as the one that came with the car seat. But sturdy and worry free.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie  Washel

customer_reviews.title: Puppy safety
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a dog car seat but the harness that came w/it wasn't right. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Same tether that came with the solvit car harness.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement tether for the solvit deluxe car harness. It's exactly the same as the one that came with the harness. Only complaint here would be it's a little pricey for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Orko

customer_reviews.title: Ride Seat Tether
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can attach it to my dog's harness when she rides in a doggie car seat, however, the clasp is large and awkward to use when attaching to the ring on the dog's harness.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vujovich

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and no doubt that this tether will support 2000 pounds, very heavy strap and clip. Definitely was a great purchase for my dog 🐕.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Miano

customer_reviews.title: Great for 35 lb Buttercup
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these now, one in two of our cars. They work well. We clipbit to our dog’s harness or to the bottom of the leash at the harness.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dill

customer_reviews.title: Works great to keep our puppy in his car seat
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep our puppy in his car seat. I just hook it to his harness and he's all set.
customer_reviews.author: midwife1

customer_reviews.title: Safety First!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for all my dogs. They are like my children and therefore we do not go for a ride unless they are seatbelted in with their harness and seatbelt.
customer_reviews.author: Kim johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. One of the biggest hassles of taking my rear facing car seat in and out of the car is dealing with the tether. This tether is so much easier to use when installing my car seat. There's is way more room for the hook and loop to fit and a much better product than the one that actually came with our car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Nice clip and tether
customer_reviews.text: Good material and secures my dog to back of seat for extra security rather than the dog car seat tether. Easy to use. Nice clip.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You tether your dog with this and then the dog ...
customer_reviews.text: You tether your dog with this and then the dog spins and it gets wrapped up and soon starts to tighten on the collar, becoming a choking hazard. Would not buy.
customer_reviews.author: aka_Locke

customer_reviews.title: It's really a good idea! Here are some suggestions!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think we can give an honest review maybe a suggestion. Use on older dogs. Our puppy chewed through the weather. And it is probably best to use their harness because the carrabener did not fit our harness loop correctly. It's definitely a good idea!
customer_reviews.author: B. Wischer

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in order to attach in my dog's car seat. The car seat I purchased did not come with an attached tether. It works with the car seat or with the seat belt. I like this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Replaces one that was lost when car was sold with the tether in it. Glad to be able to find this part to complete my harness and dog sling for the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Confusin
customer_reviews.text: Warning, this comes with virtually no directions. Kinda had to get creative to figure out how to use it. Once installed though, it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: ajones

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product but if you buy dog car seat it May come with one.  Check BEFORE!
customer_reviews.text: Great, Strong tether. RETURNED because dog car seat came with tether!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Z

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the seatbelt receptacle of my Toyota RAV4. Just be sure to use it with a harness that has a wide piece of material over the breast bone to keep the dog safe from injury in the event of a quick stop or accident.
customer_reviews.author: NursinOne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: way to heavy for Annie my 5.5 lb toy poodle
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Works but is a bit too short for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: Strong but a bit short for a larger dog to be restrained comfortably
customer_reviews.author: jedi105

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, every pup should have one for their safety
customer_reviews.author: VMC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely feel like it would be secure and hold her relatively still ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7 lb Maltese that uses this product with a harness in the car. Definitely feel like it would be secure and hold her relatively still in case of an accident but if I give her any room to be able to move she tends to get tangle up in it pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Joanna Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Travel must have
customer_reviews.text: Love our carseat and now with our new addition we needed a tether. Sold it has made our travel sweet!,
customer_reviews.author: DMD

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I neede
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I needed to connect our dogs harnesses to the top-of-rear seat (truck) metal bracket used for kids car seats
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: GreT Product!
customer_reviews.text: We liked the first one so much we got a second. It works just as it says it wii! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The "clip" on the end is pretty big for a standard size ring on a dog's ...
customer_reviews.text: The "clip" on the end is pretty big for a standard size ring on a dog's harness, but it works fine. It's a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Spurrier

customer_reviews.title: Big but strong
customer_reviews.text: just bought my little guy a booster seat, wanted an extra harness, this clips on this are HUGE, his vest has been great with the seatbelt, well see what comes with the seat itself
customer_reviews.author: MZD2UTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: This will not work if you dog is a (light) ...
customer_reviews.text: This will not work if you dog is a (light) chewer. My little poodle bite through this during a 45 minute car ride.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M

customer_reviews.title: I needed an extra tether for my boyfriend's car. ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra tether for my boyfriend's car. I know I'm a crazy pet mom, but if I wear a seat belt (and I plan on making my kids wear seat belts) why wouldn't I have my dog in a seat belt too? I couldn't live with myself if he was ejected from my car in an accident.
customer_reviews.author: JKP

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Simple to Use
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I had to return it because one comes with the Solvit Deluxe Car Safety Harness, which I also bought.
customer_reviews.author: Sailorman

customer_reviews.title: Ease of attaching
customer_reviews.text: I like it as it is easy to connect the only problem is my dog which is a small dog can chew through it. I’m on my third one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Safe
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, keeps our puppy safe in the back seat in her booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great tether allows mobility!
customer_reviews.text: The tether allows my dog more mobility in the back seat and I feel better knowing she is safer when riding.
customer_reviews.author: Gaston Grandma

customer_reviews.title: This does the job very nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for my cats new stroller. They said it had a tether but it didn't. This does the job very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: James E Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Aussie
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the shoulder strap in the car she can move and hang her head out the window but not get out.. Also use it to clip her to my jeans when we out so I'm hands free as well
customer_reviews.author: Shielah S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product but too heavy for my pup to have hanging from his neck.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Dare and easy
customer_reviews.text: This allows me to drive undistracted while keeping my dog safe. It’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Judyth B. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great seatbelt for my mastiff!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great for keeping my Mastiff puppy in her seat while keeping her nice and safe.
customer_reviews.author: R.J.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and secure
customer_reviews.text: This works great and I attached to her preferred vest versus other products bulky vests. I use a leash as well to connect and secure to seat. She is confortable laying in dog bed with secure tight strap now.
customer_reviews.author: Connie K.

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to set up in your car and keeps your ...
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to set up in your car and keeps your pet safe in the event of a crash. Great purchase for pet owners since the animals often are forgotten in safety features.
customer_reviews.author: Pugwump

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the one that came with my dog's booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Stone

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and secures my dog to a seat-belt ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and secures my dog to a seat-belt. She can stay in a seat and I feel safe having the window down, not having to worry about her trying to make a break for it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: If your dog is a pacer this is probably not ...
customer_reviews.text: If your dog is a pacer this is probably not for you. Our dog keeps getting it wrapped around her head because it does not have a swivel piece on the the clip
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! They have plenty of room to move around ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these to put hook my dogs' leashes to when I put them in the back so they can't just jump out when I open the hatch...PERFECT! They have plenty of room to move around but they can't take off when we get to our destination :)
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Safety Hazard if your dog is "fidgity"
customer_reviews.text: If you have a fidgity dog, or one who likes to look out the window constantly, this product can pose a danger risk. Even if using in conjunction with a carseat... it WILL get tangled around their legs, body, and head. Look for a tether with a "Swivel" to avoid this issue, which is really a safety hazard, ESPECIALLY if it happens while you're driving
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Better than tying a leash around the head rest
customer_reviews.text: I like having this for the car instead of leashes, but I wish the clip was a little smaller. It's hard to get the beaner through her harness. Other than that it's a strong product, holds well, and I received it quick!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Sanders

customer_reviews.title: happy drivers.
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to try these on chihuahua harnesses to attach in car. Worked perfectly. Not too bulky and just long enough. Safe dogs, happy drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Randi DuFresne

customer_reviews.title: Golden Approved
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed to secure harnessed 80 lb golden retrievers in vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: ChandlerLady

customer_reviews.title: Best clip around!
customer_reviews.text: Best I've found! Easy to use and very sturdy! I tried a lighter, less expensive safety seat clip, but it was small and hard to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: The NanaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This works great. We are using this in our 2nd car ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great. We are using this in our 2nd car with the Kurgo Tru-Fit harness. This works great, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Solvit Deluxe Car Safety Tether
customer_reviews.text: To tether kittens in back seat of car using "zipline" reviewed earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Elie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this gives our dogs movement with control in how far they have movement
customer_reviews.author: sheila k moore

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy though a bit to long for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: MeOhio

customer_reviews.title: Great value !
customer_reviews.text: Great product to keep my furry kids safer while in the car
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Storti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works heat to connect our furry friends easy fast and closer to the regular seat belt.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Ward

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple, fit for purpose, and a value for money. What more can I ask for.
customer_reviews.author: SJLee

customer_reviews.title: Dog tether
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs and this works perfect tin my carrier
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen

customer_reviews.title: This is better than the seal belt clip since my dog steps ...
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the seal belt clip since my dog steps on the seat belt and can actually take it out.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine pena

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it for her
customer_reviews.text: Ensures safety for my dog while riding in the car. Glad I got it for her.
customer_reviews.author: michiganpackrat

customer_reviews.title: because the strap that comes with it is just a little too short and made my dog not happy. I bought a strong carabiner at the ha
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to use as an extender for the Solvit pet booster seat I have, because the strap that comes with it is just a little too short and made my dog not happy. I bought a strong carabiner at the hardware store and put that on the looped end of this strap and hooked them up. I don't know if I would recommend that for a super safety factor, but my dog doesn't really jump around the car. I just wanted a longer strap so he could easily curl up in the seat without the strap cutting into him and this solution works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too short, my dog is constantly tangling his back leg. I would suggest carbiners on both ends.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's meant to do and arrived quickly. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as tying pets leash to the backrest.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the carabiner is a little large for small dogs. ...
customer_reviews.text: the carabiner is a little large for small dogs. Wish both sides had a carabiner. not sure how the other end is supposed to attach to the seatbelt if it's not only a lapband type.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, would be nice to be longer for larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mills

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and sturdy tether. Easy to adjust and clip.
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: I can easily hook it to their vests
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY a solution!!! I can see why their brand name is "Solvit". I have two pomeranians that always want to be on your lap or in your face when riding in the car. I have used the car seats previously but they take up a lot of added space. Having this tether is much easier, I can easily hook it to their vests. I just throw a towel down on the back seat and strap them in. They have enough freedom that they don't feel trapped, but they are secured enough that they can't venture into the front seat or be injured in the event of a quick stop.
customer_reviews.author: Bethie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A snap is easier to fasten, but it works alright.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy but use with a harness, not a collar.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quick, easy way to anchor your dog to a tether so he doesn't try to jump in the front seat while you're driving. However, be careful not to attach it to a choke collar. Best to attach it to a harness rather than to any type of neck collar. It's not really a 'safety' belt, it's just a tether.
customer_reviews.author: Magicbird

customer_reviews.title: But you cannot attach it to the top of the headrest if you want it to comfortable fit your dog
customer_reviews.text: The length of the tether is very short. I expected it to be longer. It is really only relevant for smaller dogs. I have a 65lb Goldendoodle. We've made it work by attaching it to the seatbelt so he can pull the seatbelt and get some wiggle room. But you cannot attach it to the top of the headrest if you want it to comfortable fit your dog.
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Attention- this comes WITH the solicit car harness!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 car harnesses and 2 of these but didn't need these- they are a duplicate of the one you get in box w your vest! - for the cost these are super nice ! Very strong heavy carabiners! This loops over the cross seat belt and then you attach to your pets harness! ( via carabiner)
customer_reviews.author: MtnBrookieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product but could be longer
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it was a tiny bit longer. I know the whole point is to restrict the dog but at some point he needs to have enough room to lay down while in the car. Also be careful because the carabiner does not fit into all the loops of a dogs harness. My Pooch is a thick 27 Lbs and he is still a bit restricted by the seatbelt. Overall, good quality and well made, just wish it was longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: We still are looking for a better harness to attach it to
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this, because he can sit in the backseat without riding in a kennel -- for him, its a huge improvement! We still are looking for a better harness to attach it to, since clearly this will hold up in a crash -- just need a harness that will too!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia E. Rands

customer_reviews.title: Too bad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased based on fav product reviews but after one use the harness failed at the claspe. The short nylon cord separated from the female side of the plastic closure.
customer_reviews.author: MKBaltCity

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I thought I needed this for another product to work and I was wrong. Then i couldn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Allows Greater Freedom Of Movement While Keeping Fido Secured.
customer_reviews.text: Great extension for the Solve It Harness. Allows the dog a bit more freedom of movement depending on the configuration of your vehicle and it's seatbelts.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B

product_meta.title: PetSafe Happy Ride Seat Belt Tether for Dogs, Adjustable Strap Keeps Pets Secure in Car
product_meta.description: The PetSafe Happy Ride Seat Belt Tether lets you safely secure your active dog in the backseat so you and your best friend can enjoy being on the go together. The seat belt tether works with your pup’s Happy Ride Car Harness and adjusts to let you customize his range of mobility in the car. The durable nylon tether and carabiner are simple to set up and will help keep any size furry family member safe while traveling. The Happy Ride Seat Belt Tether is just one of the ways PetSafe is here to help you and your pet live happy together.
feature_bullets: SIMPLE SET UP: The tether is quick and easy to install; simply slip your seat belt through the loop on the tether and connect the carabiner to your dog’s harness
DURABLE: The adjustable nylon strap and carabiner make the tether strong enough to secure even the most active pup
UNIVERSAL DESIGN: The tether is adjustable and works in most cars, trucks and SUVs
DECREASES DRIVER DISTRACTION: The tether keeps your furry family members safely secure in their seat so you can stay focused on the road
SUITABLE FOR ALL SIZES: The tether is suitable for any size furry family member
COMPATIBLE: The tether works with all sizes of the PetSafe Happy Ride Car Harness
QUALITY GUARANTEED: PetSafe brand has been a trusted global leader in pet behavior, containment and lifestyle innovations for nearly 30 years; we help pets and their people live happily together
U.S.-BASED CUSTOMER CARE: Let our pet product experts help; we’re available Monday through Saturday to answer your questions at 1-800-845-3274

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
